channel.title: Multiplexing changing Xml code
channel.description: Hi there I am trying to run two multiplexers into the core board using Script/script2 written by Johannes which is working great for one 4051 ic I just need to know how I can change the output pin from PB0 As I have no XML experience

item.title: Multiplexing changing Xml code
item.dc:creator: @s1thlord chris
item.description:
@s1thlord wrote:

Hi there thanks for the advice I think I have solved the problem thankfully buchla style mod oscillator is back on track :)))

Read full topic

item.title: Multiplexing changing Xml code
item.dc:creator: @Sputnki Filippo Tamagnini
item.description:
@Sputnki wrote:

No need to work with xml anymore.. Just use the object editor.

Also, could you point us to the patch you're using? Maybe it will be easier to give you an answer.
In the mean time you could try to hack the code from gpio objects.. Just open them in the editor, click on the arrow and embed as patch/object.. Then you can click edit and see what code they're using and what you could adapt to your object

Read full topic
